properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 11 at 7:40AM CST until February 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Tennessee...

Richland Creek Above Pulaski affecting Giles County

. recent heavy rainfall has caused Richland Creek to rise above action stage.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Richland Creek Above Pulaski
* At 7 AM Tuesday the stage was 16.1 feet.
* Action stage is 16.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river will rise to near 19.5 feet tomorrow morning.
* At 20.0 feet...Portions of Vales Mill Rd between Chicken Creek Rd and the
Highway 64 bypass become inundated and may be subject to closure
* At 16.0 feet...Flooding of low lying agricultural land along the river begins
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
